Packet

public Packet(double x,
              double y,
              double z,
              double m,
              double t_x,
              double t_y,
              double t_z)
This is a constructor to teh Packet class.

Parameters:
x - x-coordinate of packet's initial location
y - y-coordinate of packet's initial location
z - z-coordinate of packet's initial location
m - Mass of the packet which is represented in the form of a sphere.
t_x - x-coordinate of packet's target location
t_y - y-coordinate of packet's target location
t_z - z-coordinate of packet's target location
